post.text: For 30 years -- 30 YEARS -- Hillary Clinton hasn't fixed anything. In fact, her only experience has been at failing. As President, believe me, there will be dramatic change. We are going to get things DONE! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Mark
comment.text: This was a great analogy of Hillary....next time she brings up Mr. Trump's tax returns ....he should simply say...."Hillary, Gee, I emailed them to you"! So sick of this corrupt woman!!!!!

replies.author: Zackary
replies.text: She is not a currupt women it is only fair if he shares his tax returns. He is hiding something.

replies.author: Lucas
replies.text: Zackary are you sure she's not corrupt http://wearechange.org/hillarys-20-biggest-scandals/
